comments.body: I guess it's not reasonable to move the implementation to /mllib ? No big deal, just wondering if we can generally have ml call mllib and not the reverse, but this isn't 100% true even now.

I will have a try to find whether it is easy to move impl to /mllib

> Most of the change here is breaking out the inner class right?

Yes
@srowen I guess we can not easily move the implementation to /mllib, since Summizer is impled in /ml.
